description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Get the right sushi and satisfy your guests. It's as easy as raising the satisfaction level to 100% within the time limit.  For this sushi game, almost everything has been drawn with brush.
